body: Only dwarves may select one of these traits.
name: Dwarf Race Traits

sections.body: Your keen senses lead you to hidden treasures. You gain a +2 trait bonus on Perception checks related to metals, jewels, and gemstones.
sections.name: Goldsniffer
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Race Traits/Dwarf Race Traits/Goldsniffer

sections.body: Caves and tunnels are a second home to you. While underground, you receive a +2 trait bonus on initiative checks and a +1 trait bonus on weapon damage rolls for critical hits (this damage is multiplied on a critical hit).
sections.name: Tunnel Fighter
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Race Traits/Dwarf Race Traits/Tunnel Fighter
